title: Woman with Dead Child (Frau mit totem Kind)
medium: engraving and softground etching retouched with black chalk, graphite, and metallic gold paint on heavy wove paper [trial proof]
dimensions: sheet (trimmed to and within plate mark): 41.7 x 47.2 cm (16 7/16 x 18 9/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Philip and Lynn Straus, in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the National Gallery of Art
